name: クリアα
message: "You've really done it now."
The one who was singing shrugs and lets out an annoyed sigh.
The singing has stopped, so while the headache persists, I can at least think again.
Clear staggers backward, clutching his arm.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Clear! ...Ngh!"

name: 蓮
message: "Aoba!"
Ren helps push me up. I stand and run over to Clear.
I grab Clear's shoulders to support him as he sways.
The right arm of his coat is burned and tattered.
I guess I didn't imagine those sparks earlier...

name: 蒼葉
message: "Clear, are you okay?!"

name: クリア
message: "Master, I'm sorry. I'm fine."

name: クリアα
message: "Do you have any idea what you just did?"
Clear's eyes blaze with anger.

name: クリアα
message: "If not, that arm should tell you. But hey, too late to stop now. You really are an idiot. Hehehe..."

name: クリア
message: "It doesn't matter what happens to me. I stopped you. I saved Master."

name: クリアα
message: "What a moron. You really are broken beyond repair. Hehe."
He laughs melodically as he returns to his partner's side.

name: クリアα
message: "Well, no point trying to repair you now. We'll be going."

name: クリアα
message: "That fake master of yours is gonna end up dyed in the Celebration anyway. You saved him for nothing."

name: 蒼葉
message: "The Celebration..."
The thing Granny mentioned? They're going to use Dye Music there?
Hell, that might only be the beginning.

name: クリアα
message: "I can't wait. Soon, all you stupid humans will be our slaves."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey, wait!"
The two other Clears glance at us, then walk off casually down the alley.

name: 蓮
message: "Aoba, do we go after them?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "No. It's fine."
They're already gone. I turn to Clear.
Clear is holding his injured arm. He seems like he's in pain.
When I see his arm, I gasp. Something is dripping through his fingers.
...Blood.

name: 蒼葉
message: "You're...!"
I reach out, but Clear pulls away.
